remarks.para: May be inoperative provided the aircraft is not operated in precipitation within 5 statute miles of airport of takeoff or intended landing.
Both wipers must operate, and the high speed or low speed feature may be inoperative.

numlitem.para: Downgrade aircraft dispatch category status to CAT 1.
Operations in known precipitation within 5 statute miles of the airport of takeoff or intended landing is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Windshield WIPER Selector "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
